snippet: Though its 16-man roster is much smaller than those of powerhouses like Southern Cal and U.C.L.A., St. Francis College has reached the semifinals for the third time in eight years.
abstract: St Francis College of Brooklyn men's water polo team has reached the NCAA semifinals for the third time in eight years, despite having a much smaller roster than powerhouses like Southern California and UCLA.

byline.original: By JOHN D'ANTONIO and MICHAEL RANDAZZO

lead_paragraph: Though its 16-man roster is much smaller than those of powerhouses like Southern Cal and U.C.L.A., St. Francis College has reached the semifinals for the third time in eight years.

headline.seo: St. Francis Makes a Splash in N.C.A.A. Water Polo
headline.main: At N.C.A.A. Tournament, a Splash From Brooklyn, by Way of Europe
headline.print_headline: At N.C.A.A. Tournament, a Splash From Brooklyn, by Way of Europe
